item.title: Bikes in wrong bay, 31st October
item.description:
These Limes bikes are left in a resident only parking bay and are now beginning to overflow on to double yellow lines. Itâ€™s always Lime riders. They always abuse the rules with no consequences. Please do something about this.

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 31st October
item.description:
This car has been left here for over 2 months and Noone knows who it belongs to, it has clearly been in an accident, unsure if it is a stolen vehicle or not? It has tax and mot but we have not seen anyone coming to claim it or attempt recovery or repair
